HomePage.projectDescription: Modulon is a scalable and secure platform for user and authorization management, built with Next.js (frontend) and NestJS + Prisma (backend). The system uses a modern approach to session handling, access and refresh tokens, and is prepared for future containerization, caching, load balancing, and migration to PostgreSQL. The architecture is based on a monorepo aligned with best practices.
